title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk and cotton embroidery on rayon foundation
Technique: embroidered in feather, buttonhole, stem, satin, running, herringbone, couching, knot, bullion knot and chain stitches with looping (needlelace) applique and cut fabric work on plain weave foundation
description: Embroidery and open work patterns in shades of brown in a square within a square arrangement.
name: Sampler
